name: WhichApp
description:
A university game jam made over 3 weeks with the theme "I know what you did"

What App? WhichApp!

You are Grandma Tinnie and you a professional stalker/scammer with juicy intel on Rap Baby Jr's dark deeds. With WhichApp, your goal is to extort as much money as possible for a noble cause.

How to play (a scammer) effectively

Choose dialog options to proceed.

Credits

Programming - Jacob Garneau

Narrative, Sounds, UI Polish - Sharon Ku

Visuals - Luka Ross

Sounds

Gypsy Doo Wop by John Bartmann

A Typical Ride Out by Noir Et Blanc Vie

Melodie Victoria by Kevin MacLeod

Sound effects from Mixkit.co
